CustomField.description: If this field is set TRUE, the dates Shipment Dates From and Thru and InStore From and Thru dates will have always the values set in Date From and Date Thru.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this field is set TRUE, the dates Shipment Dates From and Thru and InStore From and Thru dates will have always the values set in Date From and Date Thru.
CustomField.label: Synchronize Promotion Timeframes
